org.sakaiproject.user.api

Interface UserNotificationPreferencesRegistration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnouncementUserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl, ContentUserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl, MailArchiveUserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl, MatrixUserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl, SyllabusUserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl, UserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl, WizardUserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl

    public interface UserNotificationPreferencesRegistration
    This interface provides methods to allow a tool to set various options for notification preferences
    Author:
    chrismaurer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDefaultValue()
      See NotificationService.PREF_NONE, NotificationService.PREF_IGNORE, NotificationService.PREF_DIGEST, NotificationService.PREF_IMMEDIATE, etc.
      Map<String,String> getOptions()
      Get the key/value pairs that represent the notification option texts and values
      String getPrefix()
      Return the prefix used in the preference storage.
      Object getResourceLoader(String location)
      This method will allow registering tools to supply their own location for resource loaders
      String getSectionDescription() 
      String getSectionTitle() 
      String getToolId()
      Return the toolId that identifies the tool registering these preferences.
      String getType()
      Return the configured type.
      boolean isExpandByDefault()
      Will the section div be expanded by default, or will only the section title be visible
      boolean isOverrideBySite()
      Can site specific options be set?

    • Method Detail

      • getSectionTitle

        String getSectionTitle()
        Returns:
        String Returns the text to be displayed for the section header

      • getSectionDescription

        String getSectionDescription()
        Returns:
        String Returns the text to be displayed for the section description

      • getDefaultValue

        String getDefaultValue()
        See NotificationService.PREF_NONE, NotificationService.PREF_IGNORE, NotificationService.PREF_DIGEST, NotificationService.PREF_IMMEDIATE, etc. This value will be the string representation of that int value.
        Returns:
        String The default notification option for this tool

      • getType

        String getType()
        Return the configured type. Something like this: sakai:content
        Returns:
        String type

      • getPrefix

        String getPrefix()
        Return the prefix used in the preference storage. Something like this: rsrc
        Returns:
        String prefix

      • getToolId

        String getToolId()
        Return the toolId that identifies the tool registering these preferences. Something like this: sakai.resources
        Returns:
        String toolId

      • getOptions

        Map<String,String> getOptions()
        Get the key/value pairs that represent the notification option texts and values
        Returns:

      • isOverrideBySite

        boolean isOverrideBySite()
        Can site specific options be set?
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isExpandByDefault

        boolean isExpandByDefault()
        Will the section div be expanded by default, or will only the section title be visible
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getResourceLoader

        Object getResourceLoader(String location)
        This method will allow registering tools to supply their own location for resource loaders
        Parameters:
        location -
        Returns:
